name: Schadenfreude - Umbrella patch
description:
This game was developed for the LudumDare43.

DESCRIPTION: You are a clown, the enjoyment of others is at the cost of your dignity (and not only that)

DURATION: Under 5 minutes

CONTROLS: arrow keys + space

ENGINE: UNITY3D 2018, WebGL build

This is an interactive narrative with some gameplay. It ended up being more French than expected, but that was a nice surprise. We hope you will enjoy it.
